trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Norwich
There were no other sightings in Norwich on or around April 25th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI TOOK DIGITAL PHOTOS OF ABOUT 20 ROPE EXHAUST TRAILS AND A COUPLE OF THE OBJECTS MAKING THEM.ALSO MANY GOV`T.PLANES WERE FLYING AROUND AT THE SAME TIME.WHERE COULD I SEND A SHOT OF THE THINGS MAKING THEM?I GOT A COUPLE. THE NEIGHBORS SAW THEM TOO AND MY FAMILY. WE WERE OUTSIDE WORKING ON MY SON`S NEW(TO HIM) CAR. I LOOKED UP AND SAW THE TRAILS.A GOV`T PLANE IS WHAT I THOUGHT AND THINK IT IS.HOW THEY GOT IT ?WHO KNOWS. THEY WERE FLYING REALLY HIGH AND REALLY FAST!I WAS EXCITED AND TALKED LOUDLY.WE REALLY COULD`NT SEE THE THINGS DOING IT.BUT THE CAMERA CUT THRU THE HAZE.THE PLANES WERE FLYING MUCH LOWER.TO ME THEY LOOK LIKE A SWEPT WING JET WITH WEIRD ENGINES THAT POINT OUT.MAYBE A B1?I BELIEVE THEY POINT OUTWARD TOO.AND THEY ARE SWINGWINGS.THE THINGS UP HIGH LOOKED MORE LIKE AN ARROWHEAD TO ME.LIKE A HUNTING ARROW ALMOST.WITH THE SWING OUT TIPS.
